html.title: GAME
html.welcome: Welcome to the Wonderful World of GAME.
html.game: GAME is a brand new text-based role-playing game set in a strange and intimidating WORLD. To learn more about a specific detail simply hover your mouse over thatdetail to reveal interesting facts and perhaps important clues.
html.people: During your time in WORLD you will encounter many interesting people to greet or trade with your new acquaintance simply click their NAME and select TALK, BARTER, TRADE, ETC.
html.enemies: Not all people and creatures you will meet in WORLD will be of the friendly sort, in fact some will attack given provocation and others still will be all out aggressive.
html.enemy: To engage an ENEMY click on their name.
html.travel: During your travels you will find many useful
html.item: ITEMS to collect and
html.object: OBJECTS to interact with. Here again, simple click will do the trick.
html.bronzeDoor: There is a bronze door here.
html.key: There is a key here
html.weed: There is some dank weed here
html.gun: There is a gun here
html.potion: There is a potion here
html.exit: An EXIT stands before you. Should you choose to step through the doorway your life will never be the same.

name.name: Name
name.modifiesDialogue: <button id='weed' class='dialogue'>That was some dank weed.</button>

fiend.name: fiend
fiend.modifiesText: A fallen fiend lies lifelessly on the floor
fiend.itemText: A single shot kills the fiend
fiend.itemModifies: A fallen fiend lies lifelessly on the floor

inspect.title: The Ultimate Game
inspect.anotherTitle: Do not play GAME if you are prone to seizures
inspect.rpg: Nobody plays this sort of game.
inspect.world: The world calls to you in the night. It stares at you as you sleep.
inspect.name: They are of average size and proportion, their face reminds you of someone you have never met, they wave from a distance.
inspect.enemy: A simple fiend, it shall provide a meager challenge
inspect.item: The item glimmers before you, begging to be retrieved
inspect.hiddenItem: The item is shrouded in secrecy
inspect.object: The object begs you to interact with it. what does it do? Only one way to find out.
inspect.testes: The portal before you pulsates with a welcoming energy. As you approach the doorway you begin to sense the familiar smell of your family home. You hear the voices of dear friends calling out to you.
inspect.bronzeDoor: A heavy bronze door, maybe there is a key to unlock it.
inspect.weed: You are entranced by the dank floral aroma of weed

object.inspect: you hear something move ahead of you
object.html: Within a hidden chamber lies an additional ITEM

bronzeDoor.html: There is a bronze door here.

object2.inspect: You hear something move behind you
object2.html: Seems you have found another ITEM

html.title: Beach : M-13
html.beach: On a quiet beach in the early morning.
html.nobody: You are alone, nobody seems to be around.
html.fishingRod: It appears someone has left their fishing rod by the shoreline.
html.fish: You see birds diving and hear splashing. There are fish close to shore.
html.seagull: You see a seagull roosting at the end of a rock jetty.
html.exit: A pathway North through the dunes leads into an open meadow.

seagull.name: seagull
modifiesHtml: Albatross Killed
Upon closer inspection you wordlessly realize the seagull was truly a juvenile albatross. Above a distant horizon you spy a terrible albatross tacking to the wind.
seagull.itemText: The bird happily accepts the fish
itemHtml: The seagull seems content. On closer inspection you discover it is actually a juvenile albatross.
seagull.journal: I have killed an albatross on the beach.

modifiesHtml: Albatross Killed
Above a distant horizon you spy a terrible albatross tacking to the wind.
Albatross Lives
Above a distant horizon you spy a great albatross tacking to the wind.
Seeming pleased by you, the albatross presents you with a giant fish
bigFish.journal: I have befriended a young albatross.

inspect.title: A peaceful beach
inspect.fishingRod: The fishing rod seems to be in good shape, maybe you could use it.
inspect.fish: Maybe there's something around here you could use to catch fish.
inspect.seagull: The seagull seems aggressive, maybe you could find something to placate it.
inspect.meadow: Wild flowers greet your footsteps as you approach the meadow.

modifiesHtml: After a brief struggle you finally reel in the fish
fish.inspect: This is a great time of year for fishing in these waters.
fish.interactedText: You need a fishing rod to catch fish.

fishingRod.name: Fishing Rod
modifiesHtml: The sound of crashing waves soothes your soul. You feel that you are home.

fish.name: Fish
modifiesHtml: An endless placid ocean stretches out before you.

giantFish.name: Giant Fish
modifiesHtml: Albatross Lives
Above a distant horizon you spy a great albatross tacking to the wind.

html.title: Beach Meadow : M-12
html.description: An old antennae stands just above the surrounding trees. A grassy field thick with yellow dandelions surrounds you.
html.van: There is an old van here, the doors are locked tight.
html.shack: Across from the van is a shack, it appears to be cobbled together from items that washed up on the beach
html.jeff: Jeff Church is sitting in a lawn chair, closely engaged in listening to static on the radio
html.exit: The Southern path leads back to the beach.

modifiesHtml: To the North lies the trail to the Seaside Forest.
showPath.journal: A kind man named Jeff Church has shown me the way into town.

modifiesHtml: Looking through the unlocked van you discover a baseball bat amongst the falderall.
The light atop the antennae begins to blink. Jeff's radio plays a happy song.

inspect.title: A quiet meadow, you hear the song of birds and the buzz of cicadas in the trees.
inspect.van: The van is an old Ford Econoline, it looks like it hasn't moved in ages.
inspect.baseballBat: An old slugger, perhaps you can use it to beat down monsters.
inspect.hockeyStick: An old twig, perhaps you can use it to beat down monsters.
inspect.poolCue: It smells like beer, perhaps you can use it to beat down monsters.
inspect.beach: The crashing surf calls to you at a distance
inspect.forest: The hum of cicadas intensifies as you approach the trailhead.
inspect.antennae: A giant antennae, probably left behind by the military.
inspect.fireMagazine: A magic magazine, a wizard shooting a fireball appears on the cover
inspect.strikeMagazine: A magazine for martial artists. A man breaking cement bricks with his hands appears on the cover.
inspect.shack: It looks like it will fall down in a strong breeze.
inspect.jeffChurch: A startlingly average man, his friendly eyes endear you to him immediately.

modifiesHtml: You attach the new receiver to the antennae. all that's left now is to power it up..
antennae.inspect: The antennae appears to be non-functioning, perhaps you could find something to get it working again
antennae.interactedText: It seems the antennae receiver is broken

baseballBat.name: Baseball Bat
modifiesHtml: As you rummage through the van you find a dusty old hockey stick.

fireMagazine.name: Fire-Man Issue 1
modifiesHtml: Alongside the Magic Magazine is a copy of Strike of the Southern Cross #1

hockeyStick.name: Hockey Stick
modifiesHtml: Underneath the hockey stick you spy a pool cue.

poolCue.name: Pool Cue
modifiesHtml: For good measure you should snag a potion from an open box.

potion.name: Potion
modifiesHtml: Rifling through what's left in the van you discover a beat up copy of Fire-Man #1!

strikeMagazine.name: Strike of the Southern Cross Issue 1
modifiesHtml: There is an old van parked in the shade.

html.title: Seaside Forest : M-11
html.slime: As you enter the forest, a slime hops out of the underbrush, smiling up at you and blocking your path.
html.exit: Following the trail South leads back to the meadow.

slime.name: slime
modifiesHtml: In a clearing stands a giant torteese, it does not look happy to see you.
Close to the forest entrance you discover a bubbling freshwater spring slimes splash about the puddles.
The songs of birds welcome you to the Seaside Forest. Stunted trees stand among a leafy underbrush.

frostWizard.name: frostWizard
modifiesHtml: Rifling through his robes and pouches, the wizard produces a potion and hands it to you.

goblin.name: goblin
modifiesHtml: The goblin looks dejected as it sneaks off back into the swamp. You find a potion in the copse of trees.

torteese.name: torteese
modifiesHtml: As the torteese slowly ambles off into the trees you see that it left behind a potion!
Close to the forest exit Cryan the Blizzard Wizard sits atop a stump deep in thought.
blizzardWizard.journal: I have met The Blizzard Wizard, Cryan.

modifiesHtml: Far off in the distance the pinnacle of The Wizard's Tower rises above the treetops.
wizardTower.journal: Cryan has told me of The Wizard's Tower, the home of the evil wizards.

inspect.town: You see the outlines of buildings up ahead, finally, civilization.
inspect.meadow: The forest opens up and thins as you approach the meadow.
inspect.frostWizard: A long icicled beard pokes out from the hood of his cerulean robe.
inspect.goblin: A mean-spirited, green skinned, evil goblin.
inspect.slime: A small blue slime, perhaps you can beat the squish out of him.
inspect.torteese: A giant tortoise, perhaps you have a weapon to poke him with.
inspect.wizardTower: Black and menacing, it is so far away you could miss it if you weren't shown it.

potion2.name: Potion
modifiesHtml: As you make your way through a dark and damp section of The Seaside Forest a goblin jumps out from behind a copse of trees.
You feel at peace in a clearing somewhere in the middle of the forest.

potion3.name: Potion
modifiesHtml: Finally, towards the end of the trail a menacing Frost Wizard stands defiantly.
You swat away mosquitos as you make your way through a swampy section of forest.

potion4.name: Potion
modifiesHtml: As you approach the exit to town, you hear the hum of a car making it's way down the motorway.
Close to the forest exit The Frost Wizard sits atop a stump deep in thought.

html.title: Seaside Town : M-11
html.center: In the town's central plaza, Sam Meegs peacefully tends to the flowers.
html.ahabs: The plaza around the town center is home to Ahab's Diner.
html.nemos: To the West of the town center is Nemo's Sporting Goods, a staple for years.
html.neptunes: On Main Street is the comic book shop Neptune's Dungeon.
html.aubreys: Aubrey's Inn is located on a quiet street just off the main strip.
html.sleeper: Outside Sleeper-Hit, Joe Zwik stands out amongst a group of teenagers skating in the parking lot.
html.exit: To the South lies the entrance to the Seaside Forest.

joe.name: Joe Zwik
joe.modifiesDialogue: <button id='high' class='dialogue'>Yeah man, I just woke up on the beach. I can't even remember who I am.</button>

modifiesHtml: To the East lies the Brackish Marsh, mosquitos mob you as you approach the entrance.
marsh.journal: The town naturalist, Sam, has requested that I venture through the Brackish Marsh to The Witch's House to find a rare flower for him.

modifiesHtml: Outside Sleeper-Hit, your friend Joe Zwik stands out amongst a group of teenagers skating in the parking lot.

inspect.title: A small drinking village, with a fishing problem.
inspect.center: Next to the town center a century old church stands.
inspect.ahabs: Ahab's populates an unassuming storefront. You see people inside gathered at tables laughing together.
inspect.nemos: Nemo's specializes in equipment for hobbies and sports.
inspect.neptunes: Neptune's Dungeon has been in town for years, they started out selling video tapes but transitioned to comics when Sleeper-Hit opened.
inspect.sleeper: A chain video store, it is busy with people heading in and out.
inspect.sam: A thin bald man with a peaceful demeanor.
inspect.joe: The only thing baggier than Joe's T-shirt is his Jeans.
inspect.forest: You hear birds chirping as you approach the forest.
inspect.aubreys: A centuries old inn, some say it is haunted.

html.title: Ahab's Diner
html.entrance: As you enter the diner the familiar scent of good food greets you, you begin to recall your own hometown.
html.franny: Looking flustered the waitress Waitress shouts orders into the kitchen window.
html.exit: Behind you is the door back to town.

modifiesHtml: Easing up a bit, the Waitress stands with her arms crossed.
The Cyberpunks, occupying their usual booth, are consumed by their decks.
Easing up a bit, the Waitress stands with her arms crossed.
Seems someone left behind an issue of The Adventures of Cryan #1 at the table.
comic.journal: A sweet waitress named Franny Dee gave me a hamburger and milkshake for helping her out.

modifiesHtml: Wiping sweat from her brow, it seems Franny Dee is finally relaxed.
Franny hands you a big tray of piping hot hamburgers and ice cold milkshakes.
At the counter an old man sits with his fingers crossed, meditating patiently as he waits for his food.
Wiping sweat from her brow, it seems the Waitress is finally relaxed.
At the counter an Willard sits with his fingers crossed, reading a newspaper as he eats his food.
oldMan2.journal: I have met old man Willard.

inspect.franny: Known for her stunning beauty, nobody gets in Franny Dee's way.
inspect.franny1: The most beautiful waitress in town.
inspect.franny2: The most beautiful waitress in town.
inspect.franny3: The most beautiful waitress in town.
inspect.foodTray: Piled high with piping hot hamburgers.
inspect.cyberpunks: Zealots of the latest technology, they never stop looking at their screens.
inspect.town: You'll have to push past the line of people to get out.
inspect.oldMan: A friendly older gentleman, he goes to the diner every day.

modifiesHtml: Easing up a bit, the Waitress stands with her arms crossed.
The Cyberpunks, occupying their usual booth, are consumed by their decks.
cyberpunks.inspect: They look at you sideways as you approach.
cyberpunks.interactedText: Go ahead, hand them the food tray.

foodTray.name: Food Tray
modifiesHtml: At a booth in the corner a bunch of Cyberpunks sit waiting impatiently for their food.

blizzardMagazine.name: The Adventures of Cryan #1
modifiesHtml: The jukebox in the corner is playing your favorite song.

html.title: Aubrey's Inn
html.description: As you enter Aubrey's Inn a cold chill runs down your spine. You hesitate to ring the bell on the counter.
html.exit: Behind you is the door back to town.

modifiesHtml: From somewhere in the back of the inn you hear the faint sound of a woman humming a somber tune.
As the young woman leaves, an older gentleman with a cane appears behind the counter.
innKeeper.journal: I had a strange experience in Aubrey's Inn, a young woman claimed to know me and called me 'Samuel Hallett'.

modifiesHtml: Behind the counter the Innkeep quietly looks over an old nautical chart.
As you sleep peacefully in the dark room upstairs you are suddenly awoken by the door creaking open. The air grows chill as a shadowy figure enters the room and moves to the bedside.
The room upstairs is locked tight.
ring.journal: I stayed the night at Aubrey's inn and was visited upon by a dark apparition. The apparition handed me a ring and said 'for my beloved'.

inspect.innKeeper: He looks like an old salt.
inspect.ship: The name 'H.M.S. Surprise' is engraved on the back of the model.
inspect.woman: It seems no one else can hear the sound.

modifiesHtml: Upon ringing the bell you hear the creaking of floor boards from the room behind the counter. Nobody comes out from the back, perhaps you should ring the bell again.
A model of an 18th century Royal Navy frigate stands on the mantle above the fire place.
After ringing the bell for a second time a serving girl dressed in simple early modern garb appears from the back room.

html.title: Nemo's Sporting Goods
html.description: A cardboard cut out of pro surfer Shane Kelly stands in front of everything else.
html.shirts: You peruse a rack of comfortable looking T-Shirts, you could really use one.
html.goods: On the back wall is a rack of equipment including surf boards, baseball bats, and anything a sport's fan could desire.
html.acc: You stop to look into a glass showcase arrayed with knives.
html.alexa: Behind the counter, Alexa Brodeski greets you kindly.
html.exit: Behind you is the door back to town.

modifiesHtml: The store's manager, Russ, sits behind the desk chatting joyfully with Alexa.

inspect.alexa: She's the cutest girl around, you want to ask her out on a date but are too shy.
inspect.shane: All the young surfers look up to Shane Kelly the world's greatest surfer.
inspect.shirts: The orange shirt catches your eye.
inspect.boards: You wish you could afford one.
inspect.russ: A broad man with a heart of gold.

html.title: Neptune's Dungeon
html.entrance: The smell of paper, old and new, greets you as you enter the dark comic book shop.
html.shelves: The shelves are arrayed with the latest comics, an issue of HR Guy catches your eye.
html.tabletop: Out of sight, behind all the comics and collectibles a group of young men sit playing Paper Pusher.
html.potion: It seems someone left a potion sitting on an empty shelf
html.counter: Sitting behind the counter leafing through the latest issue of Office-Man is The Shermanator.
html.exit: Behind you is the door back to town.

inspect.neptunes: A group of young men play a board game in the back of the shop. It smells like fresh paper.
inspect.sherm: The King of Comics and Video Games.
inspect.town: Through the glass door of the shop you see a group of young men smoking and chatting.
inspect.officeMan: Office-Man answers phones confidently and types faster than a pistol shrimp.
inspect.comic: HR Guy, he'll turn your quid pro quo to a quid pro no.
inspect.paper: Paper Pusher: A pen and paper role playing game letting you live out your wildest fantasies.
inspect.broker: The Broker stands confidently in his smart navy blue suit.

potion.name: Potion
modifiesHtml: A statuette of The Broker stands out among the shelves of figurines.

html.title: Brackish Marsh : M-12
html.bogPeople: As you enter the marsh, pushing aside the dense reeds, you see a Bog Person digging through the muck.
html.canal: You come to a canal too wide to hop over. Looks like you could knock over a tree
html.exit:
Behind you lies the way back to town

.

bogPerson.name: bogPerson
modifiesHtml: As you enter the marsh, pushing aside the dense reeds, you discover a Bog Person nest! It may be helpful to thin their numbers.

womanInBlack.name: womanInBlack
modifiesHtml: You rest briefly on an islet before continuing deeper into the marsh, the spectre of The Witch House looms ahead.
As the ground under your feet begins to dry, a big Black Dog holds ground between you and your destination.

blackDog.name: blackDog
modifiesHtml: Near the way to The Witch House you find a bunch of weeds growing about the marsh.
The black silhouette of The Witch House stands before you.
The Woman in Black stands before you defiantly.
You knock down a dead tree to make a bridge across a wide canal.
You find yourself on an islet in the center of the marsh. A Black Robed Woman sitting alone unbothered by the flies swarming about her.
tree.inspect: A dead tree, looks like you could knock it over.

weed.name: Dank Weed
modifiesHtml: The fragrant smell of flowery weeds lingers in the air.

html.title: Albatross' Domain - M-12
html.exit:
The Southern path leads back to the beach.
To the North lies the trail to the Seaside Forest.
